message: Let's make a deal, Bob.  I get $9,000, and you get $1,000.  It's in your best interest to accept now, as the value decreases for you with every round.
I propose a 55/45 split. It's fair considering the value loss I'm facing, and it gives you a good deal too. Let's end this quickly and avoid further depreciation.
Bob, this is a better offer than the last round, considering your shrinking pot. Take the $3,500 now before it shrinks even further.  Time is money!

Alice, I'm willing to compromise.  I'm offering a 60/40 split in your favor.  This is a fair deal considering the inflation we're facing, and it will ensure we both get a decent amount. Let's end this now before the value drops even further.
